procedures.name: Fire Drill
procedures.description: In the event of a fire, all employees should evacuate the building immediately.
steps: Leave the building by the nearest exit.
Go to the designated assembly area.
Wait for further instructions from emergency personnel.

procedures.name: Earthquake Drill
procedures.description: In the event of an earthquake, all employees should drop to the ground, take cover under a sturdy table or desk, and hold on until the shaking stops.
steps: Take cover under a sturdy table or desk.
Hold on until the shaking stops.
Once the shaking has stopped, check for injuries and damage.

procedures.name: Severe Weather Warning
procedures.description: In the event of severe weather, all employees should take necessary precautions and follow emergency guidelines.
steps: Take necessary precautions based on weather conditions.
